articles.author: Chris Tomlinson
articles.title: Italy Declares State of Emergency Over Wuhan Coronavirus
articles.description: The Italian Council of Ministers has declared a state of emergency due to the risk to public health posed by the spread of the coronavirus that originated in Wuhan, China.
articles.content:
The Italian Council of Ministers has declared a state of emergency due to the risk to public health posed by the spread of the coronavirus that originated in Wuhan, China.
The council stated there was now a “declaration of the state of emergency as a consequ… [+2326 chars]
